SIMCLT: Chain-Ladder Reserving Simulator

2025
Team: Sarah Martinez, Tom Anderson, Elena Petrov

A Monte Carlo simulation toolkit for insurance claim reserving using the Chain-Ladder method, with uncertainty quantification and interactive visualization of reserve estimates.

Python 3.10+ NumPy SciPy Matplotlib Streamlit +2 more
Recognition:
  • Best Team Project Award 2025
  • Featured by Swiss Actuarial Association

üèÜ Get Your Project Featured

Want to see your project in the showcase? Here's how to get featured:

üéØ Excellence Criteria

  • Exceptional code quality and architecture
  • Innovative approach or significant impact
  • Comprehensive testing and documentation
  • Professional presentation and usability

üìã Submission Process

  • Complete your final project with all requirements
  • Achieve high scores on technical assessment
  • Demonstrate innovation or real-world impact
  • Instructor nomination or self-nomination

Interested in submitting your project? Contact the instructor after completing your final project with:

  • GitHub repository link
  • Brief project description
  • Demo or deployment links
  • Highlights of technical achievements
